lines: 1. Wapaki, Nyasaye,In miherowa ngang`!Nioro Wuodi mond`othonwa e yath.
2. Wapaki, Nyasaye,nikech Roho Maler.Osefwenyonwa heramar Jawarwa.
3. Pak duto obed niNyarombo Nyasaye,Ma noting`o kethwa,rembe nochwernwa.
4. Pak duto obed ni,Nyasaye, Wuon ng`wono,Ma noresowa kendooritowa.
5. Chiew chunywa duto,pong`wa gi herani;Mach moa e poloomi chunywa liet.
